msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides. kollesis at the middle of the column. The column is broken at the bottom as a result of two vertical folds. The right hand side is badly damaged at the top and bottom of the column and it has many lacunae, some of them as a result of a vertical fold. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer and marking an oblique stroke going downwards to the left margin in other lines.
